title: ExoSquad MovieBook
description:
EXO Squad MovieBook:


In the year 2119, the genetically engineered slave race called the Neo-Sapiens rebel against their creators the Homo-Sapiens.  

On this interactive CD-Rom, you are a trainee in the Exo Fleet Academy.  You will get to know more about E-Frame mecha and the history of the Neo-Sapiens.  As well, you will be able to design your own E-Frame mecha. The CD-Rom is geared towards young children getting them interested in buying ExoSquad, so keep your expectations low.
  
Short video and audio clips with still pictures are to be found on this CD-Rom.

MovieBook created by
Akklaim Software, Sound Source Interactive, R.I. Soft Systems, and Ovation.

System Specifications:
Windows 3.1/3.3
CPU 386
2x CD-Rom
256 bit Color

DosBox may be needed. <a href="
http://www.dosbox.com/download.php?main=1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.dosbox.com/download.php?main=1</a>


Bonus:
1. The Sega Saturn Exo Squad game 
plays on Windows PC without an emulator. 
2. ExoSquad Issue 01 comic in .CBR file format.
